hexcombat.page.util_spells.shears:
Accepts a sheep entity, tries to shear it. 
Costs 1 amethyst dust
hexcombat.page.combat_spells.harm: Accepts an entity, harms it based on the number provided in the argument, costs 1 amethyst dust plus double damage. There seems to be a limit of how strong i can make this spell, anything above 10 nature doesn't let me cast
hexcombat.page.dummy_actions.signum: Accepts a number, returns -1 if it is negative, 0 if 0, 1 if positive.
